::KitKat::
She took the spark and smiled. "Thank you Bludgeon."  She put the 
spark in her hip compartment and held her rifle. "Now we leave. 
HellBeast, do what you will with the body. I no longer care to look 
at it any more."

She then motionted for the others to follow her.  She started walking 
to the base.  She whispered to Destructor, "Have one of your men lag 
behind us bit. I don't trust Hell Beast, or any of his crew."

She walked off towards Destructor's base.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Alloran2@a... wrote:
> :::Bludgeon:::
> 
> ::he cuts all the way through and takes out the spark.  he hands it 
KitKat::
